tool_description: Launches survey distribution across specified channels to validated participant lists with customizable messaging and scheduling options.

channels.description: Distribution channels matching the survey links

participant_count.description: Number of participants to receive the survey

scheduled_time.description: Scheduled launch time if not immediate

custom_message.description: Custom message to include with survey invitation

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: survey_links and channels arrays must have the same length.
Invalid participant_count: Must be a positive integer.
Invalid scheduled_time: Must be a future datetime in ISO 8601 format when launch_immediately is false.
Empty survey_links: At least one survey link is required.
Unsupported channel: Use supported channels [email, sms, web_portal, mobile_app, qr_code].
usage: Provide survey_links, matching channels, and participant_count. Set launch_immediately or provide scheduled_time. Optionally include custom_message for personalized invitations.

launch_status.description: Overall status of the distribution launch

estimated_delivery_time.description: Estimated completion time for all distributions
